text: Chaudhry Amir Hussain (born 22 June 1942) is a Pakistani politician. He was the 17th Speaker of National Assembly of Pakistan from 2002 to 2008. Hussain lost his re-election to the parliament in the February 2008 election.Nirupama Subramanian, "Big heads roll in Pakistan poll" , The Hindu, February 20, 2008. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Pakistan Category:1942 births Category:People from Jammu and Kashmir Category:Punjabi people
title: Chaudhry Amir Hussain
